  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92785</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92785</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Repérage du milieu de la route</string>
            <string language="en">Marking the middle of the road</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kennzeichnen der Mitte der Straße</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Marcando o meio da estrada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Contrassegnare la metà della strada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαρακτηρισμός της μέσης του δρόμου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Marcar el centro del camino</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre comment un plot réflectorisé sur la route fonctionne. Les réflecteurs à  l'intérieur du plot réflectorisé renvoient la lumière de telle façon que le conducteur puisse voir les limites de la route.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how a cat's eye on the road works. Reflectors inside the cat's eye reflect light back so the driver can see the boundaries of the road.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">chat</string>
            <string language="en">cat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">yeux</string>
            <string language="en">eyes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflecteurs</string>
            <string language="en">reflectors</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie ein Katzenauge auf der
Straße arbeitet. Reflektoren innerhalb des Katzenauges 
reflektieren Lichtrückseite, also kann der Treiber die Grenzen der 
Straße sehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como um olho de gato na 
estrada trabalha. Os refletores dentro do olho de gato refletem 
a parte traseira da luz assim que o excitador pode ver os limites da 
estrada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come un occhio del 
gatto sulla strada funziona. I riflettori all'interno 
dell'occhio del gatto riflettono la parte posteriore della luce in 
modo da il driver può vedere i contorni della strada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς ένα μάτι της 
γάτας στο δρόμο λειτουργεί. Οι ανακλαστήρες μέσα στο μάτι 
της γάτας απεικονίζουν την ελαφριά πλάτη έτσι ο οδηγός μπορεί 
να δει τα όρια του δρόμου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo un ojo de gato en
el camino trabaja. Los reflectores dentro del ojo de gato 
reflejan la parte posteriora de la luz así que el programa piloto 
puede ver los límites del camino.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Katze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Augen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflektoren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">olhos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">refletores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gatto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">occhi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflettori</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γάτα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μάτια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντανάκλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανακλαστήρες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflectores</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
